items.summary: Update the global color scheme in frontend/index.css to match the McKinsey healthcare page color palette from https://www.mckinsey.com/industries/healthcare/how-we-help-clients/americas/business-building, replacing the current orange and teal colors with McKinsey's professional color scheme

Update frontend/tailwind.config.js to configure Tailwind CSS with the McKinsey-inspired color palette, ensuring all color tokens align with the professional healthcare business aesthetic from the reference page

Update typography settings across the site in frontend/index.css and frontend/tailwind.config.js to match McKinsey's font family, font weights, line heights, and text sizing hierarchy from https://www.mckinsey.com/industries/healthcare/how-we-help-clients/americas/business-building

Update the Navigation component (frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx) to match McKinsey's navigation bar style from https://www.mckinsey.com/industries/healthcare/how-we-help-clients/americas/business-building, including background color, text colors, spacing, and hover states

Update the Home page (frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx) hero section styling to match McKinsey's hero design from https://www.mckinsey.com/industries/healthcare/how-we-help-clients/americas/business-building, including layout, spacing, text styling, and button design

Update card component styling across all pages to match McKinsey's card design patterns from https://www.mckinsey.com/industries/healthcare/how-we-help-clients/americas/business-building, including borders, shadows, padding, and hover effects

Update button styling throughout the application to match McKinsey's button design from https://www.mckinsey.com/industries/healthcare/how-we-help-clients/americas/business-building, including primary, secondary, and outline button variants with appropriate colors, borders, and hover states

Update section spacing, padding, and layout grid system across all pages to match McKinsey's generous whitespace and content organization from https://www.mckinsey.com/industries/healthcare/how-we-help-clients/americas/business-building

Update the Footer component (frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx) styling to match McKinsey's footer design from https://www.mckinsey.com/industries/healthcare/how-we-help-clients/americas/business-building, including background color, text colors, link styling, and layout structure
